action.action-desc: Ms. Leger Fernandez introduced the following bill

Referred to the Committee on the Judiciary, and in addition to the Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned

form.official-title: To amend the Hermit’s Peak/Calf Canyon Fire Assistance Act to extend the time period for the submission of claims, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Hermit’s Peak/Calf Canyon Claims Extension Act.
Section 104 of the Hermit's Peak/Calf Canyon Fire Assistance Act (Public Law 117–180; 136 Stat. 2170) is amended—

paragraph.text: in subsection (a) by adding at the end the following:

subparagraph.text: The Administrator may appoint temporary personnel, after serving the Office continuously for 3 years, to positions in the Federal Emergency Management Agency in the same manner that competitive service employees with competitive status are considered for transfer, reassignment, or promotion to such positions.
An individual appointed under subparagraph (A) shall become a career-conditional employee, unless the employee has already completed the service requirements for career tenure.

paragraph.text: in subsection (b) by striking Not later than 2 years after the date on which regulations are first promulgated under subsection (f) and inserting Not later than December 31, 2027;
in subsection (d)(4)(C)(vii) by striking the date that is 3 years after the date on which the regulations under subsection (f) are first promulgated and inserting December 31, 2028,; and
in subsection (d)(4)(C)(viii) by striking May 31, 2024 and inserting December 31, 2028.
